document_data.name: ''Cloak of Protection Versus Law''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cloaks of protection versus law''''' were [[enchanted]] [[cloak]]s that sheltered their wearers from law enforcement.
document_data.Powers: ''Cloaks of protection versus law'' and their stronger version, ''greater cloaks of protection versus law'' both gave the wearer enhanced protection of ''+2'' and ''+5'' enchantment respectively when facing law-abiding and law-venerating creatures.
document_data.History:
After the [[Fire Knives]] were driven out of [[Cormyr]] in [[1341 DR]], Lord [[Tagreth Cormaeril]], the assassins' guild's leader commissioned numerous ''cloaks of protection versus law'' for the assassins willing to target the members of the [[Obarskyr]] royal family. Most of these assassins died in the process of hunting down King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]] and his family and the cloaks ended up going into a wider circulation.

By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], ''cloaks of protection versus law'' could be found in [[Neverwinter]], all across the [[Sword Coast North]]
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Dela Nereth]], a members of the [[Bloodsailors]] gang of Neverwinter in [[1372 DR]].
